h3.a: School News and updates related to our extended closure and education plan moving forward

div.p: POSTED 4/2/2020 Lunches: Peetz School will provide five days of lunches for all Peetz students (Pre K - 12th grade) every Monday at no charge for those families that sign up. Pickup in Peetz...
Meeting of the Board of Education AGENDA 4-21-20 Business Meeting 7:00 PM Call to order Roll Call Approval of Agenda Audience Introductions and Comments: Superintendent’s...
April 16, 2020 Dear Parents/Guardians, As you are aware, Colorado Gov. Jared Polis announced that he has suspended in-person learning in Colorado’s schools through April 30, revising the original...
2020 PROM KING AND QUEEN! Rebecca K and Michael T! Congratulations!

PEETZ PROM 2020....Grand March '2020' style. Your senior candidates and Prom Royalty are..................Well you have to view the video: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1wROBV7HoOkbBRjPEt3cIZ56lJ035gQaS/view?usp=sharing (Thank you to Mr. Forster for putting this together)

Did you know that the prom theme was going to be the Roaring 20's? There was even going to be a tribute to the Great Gatsby somewhere in the corner...right Lydia? Our Senior's Grand March would have started soon. At 7:30 our new version - the "2020 Style" will be posted. Stay tuned to our website and Facebook! And if you are doing any prom or after prom pictures today, please share with us! Let the community join in and put them in the comments on Facebook. #PeetzProm #PeetzBulldogStrong

Did you know today would have been the Class of 2020’s last high school prom? It was the junior’s prom. Their chance to plan their own party and decorate. The freshman’s first prom. Our communities chance to celebrate our youth and see them shine. We may not be able to hold this event now, but we can still celebrate. Big announcement to come later tonight. Keep following our live feed and Facebook pages!!
